title: It's Complicated: LGBT Domestic Abuse Forum's 4th Annual Conference
desc: LGBT* DAF is pleased to invite you to take part in It's Complicated, a unique conference that will focus on the intersectional ?needs and experiences of lesbian, gay, bisexual and trans* survivors of domestic abuse.? Delegates will gain an understanding of: Chaz Akoshile: The Forced Marriage Julie Newman: Regard Moud Goba: UKLGIG Aderonke Adapta Maria Sookias: Stonewall Housing Rainbow Hamlets: ?LGBT domestic abuse and Faith (Jack Gilbert) Stonewall Housing: Older LGBT Domestic Abuse (Tina Wathern) Broken Rainbow: New research into LBT women and domestic abuse (Jasna Magic) Stay Safe East- LGBT domestic abuse and disability (Ruth Bashall) Roar- Supporting LGBT survivors with complex identities (Andy Meekings) Galop- LGBT Domestic Abuse and Hate Crime and the intersection focusing on youth (Nick Anjoule) Registration: 9.30 Starts: 10.00 LGBT DAF is part of Stonewall Housing. Early Bird ticket prices were made available with the kind support of Freshfields Bruckhaus Deringer LLP?and The Oak Foundation For further access requirements, to organise a signers or to discuss an dietary needs please email maria@stonewallhousing.org ? #itscomplicated #lgbt We hope you can make it .
